name: Record Clerk: Music Challenge
description:
Want to test your music knowledge and discover new music at the same time? Record Clerk: Music Challenge serves up music trivia challenges for all genres and eras of music.

Features:
• 100% Free! No in app purchases or in game currency.
• Hundreds of challenges featuring thousands of songs.
• Enjoy the music! Score is based on accuracy. Players are not rushed with timers.
• High quality photos to set the mood for each challenge.
• Genres include: Rock, Country, Hip Hop, Top Hits, R&B, Dance, Electronic, Alt Rock, and even Christmas music.
• Challenges based on specific years will take you back in time.
• Bonus challenges will test how well you know the deep cuts from your favorite genres.
